casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Robert Jack BOUDREAUX NO. 2018-KK-0501 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 15, 2018

Denied.

HUGHES, J., would grant in part to allow for an in camera inspection.

CRICHTON, J., would grant in part to allow for an in camera inspection.

GENOVESE, J., would grant in part to allow for an in camera inspection.
